title: when calling by Pixel 2 XL, the receiver can't hear me 100% (less many words)
content:
when calling by Pixel 2 XL, the receiver can't hear me 100% (less many words) and have noise sound feedback. they complain that not hearing clearly which I call.
if I speak 10 words, they only hear 7 words include noise sound feedback to me.
I'll try  factory reset but problem same old.
Please help me fix this error.

Best regards!
